function.name: vt_add_comment_to_ip_address
function.description: With this function you can post a comment for a given IP address. The body for the POST request must be the JSON representation of a comment object. Notice however that you don't need to provide an ID for the object, as they are automatically generated for new comments.

function.name: vt_add_votes_to_ip_address
function.description: With this function you can post a vote for a given file. The body for the POST request must be the JSON representation of a vote object. Note however that you don't need to provide an ID for the object, as they are automatically generated for new votes. The verdict attribute must have be either harmless or malicious.

function.name: vt_get_comments_on_ip_address
function.description: Retrieves the comments on a provided IP address. Returns a list of Comment objects.

limit.description: Maximum number of comments to retrieve

function.name: vt_get_domain_report
function.description: Retrieves a domain report. These reports contain information regarding the domain itself that VirusTotal has collected.

function.name: vt_add_votes_to_ip_address
function.description: With this function you can post a vote for a given file. The body for the POST request must be the JSON representation of a vote object. Note however that you don't need to provide an ID for the object, as they are automatically generated for new votes. The verdict attribute must have be either harmless or malicious.

function.name: vt_get_ip_address_report
function.description: Retrieve an IP address report. These reports condense all of the recent activity that VirusTotal has seen for the resource under consideration, as well as contextual information about it.

function.name: vt_get_objects_related_to_ip_address
function.description: IP addresses have number of relationships to other objects. This returns ALL objects that fit the relationship.

relationship.description: Relationship name (see the list of items from above)

limit.description: Maximum number of comments to retrieve

function.name: vt_get_dns_resolution_object
function.description: This endpoint retrieves a Resolution object by its ID. A resolution object ID is made by appending the IP and the domain it resolves to together.
